mapper.select: SELECT e.exhibitionTitleKor exhibitionTitleKor ,e.openingTerm openingTerm ,e.openingCountry openingCountry ,e.openingCity openingCity ,w.createdDate wishingCreatedDate ,c.rating commentRating ,c.content commentContent ,c.createdDate commentCreatedDate ,b.boardId boardId ,b.title boardtitle ,b.content boardContent ,b.createdDate boardCreatedDate FROM c6_exhibition e LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM c6_wishing WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND wished = 'Y') w ON e.exhibitionId = w.exhibitionId LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM c6_comment WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND rating != 0 OR content IS NOT NULL) c ON e.exhibitionId = c.exhibitionId LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM c6_board WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND category = 'review') b ON e.exhibitionId = b.exhibitionId WHERE w.createdDate IS NOT NULL OR c.createdDate IS NOT NULL OR b.createdDate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY wishingCreatedDate DESC, commentCreatedDate DESC, boardCreatedDate DESC
